author: Special Correspondent
text:
Union Minister of State for Surface Transport Pon. Radhakrishnan on Saturday said the BJP was in contact with like-minded parties for forging a formidable alliance in the State.

In an informal chat with reporters on the sidelines of a State-level conference of Akhil Bharathiya Vidyarthi Parishad (ABVP) here, Mr. Radhakrishnan said that the BJP was talking with like-minded parties and there was no hurry to decide on an alliance as the situation was still fluid. Many other parties had not identified their alliance partners yet.

'Alliance based on policies'

The BJP had been maintaining “friendly relationship” with various parties in the State, but alliance was a different matter. It had to be based on policies and programmes, the Union Minister said.
title: ‘BJP in contact with like-minded parties’
